title: Command Universal Damage Free Hanging Picture No Tools Frame Hanger for Living Spaces, 3 Metal Picture Frame Hangers and 8 Large Command Strips
description: Command Metal Universal Frame Hangers inspire endless possibilities for personal decorations, as they hang sawtooth, D ring, wire-backed and keyhole hanging frames damage free, without the use of nails or tools. A great home improvement item, these picture hangers stick on a variety of smooth surfaces without leaving holes, marks or sticky residue. Use these wall hangers to hang framed pictures, mirrors and canvas art. Simply mount these wall hanger hooks on painted walls, ﬁnished wood, painted concrete cinder blocks, laminate, glass, metal and tiles and enjoy the damage free hanging of your favorite decorations. Perfect for home renovators and college students, use these picture frame hangers in your home, office, apartment or dorm room to elevate the appearance of your living or working space without tools. Directions are included; follow the directions closely to use the wall hangers as intended. A clever decorating and organizing solution that doesn’t damage surfaces, this picture frame hanger will help you fearlessly change your space. One package contains three silver metal hangers and eight large Command Strips. Each frame hanger will hold up to 8 pounds. Decorate, organize and celebrate damage free with Command.
